protocol.name: P-GSE50857-1
protocol.text: Raw data were processed using Affymetrix Gene Chip Operating Software (GCOS; Version 1.4.0.036). ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5 Signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE50857-2
protocol.text: At 4 days of age, cotyledons were collected as samples.

protocol.name: P-GSE50857-3
protocol.text: Wild-type, sicy-192, and sicy-192 gun1-101 plants were grown on MS medium containing 100 mM sucrose in a growth chamber kept at 25°C during 16 h of light (100 µmol/m2/s) and at 22°C during 8 h of darkness for 4 days.

protocol.name: P-GSE50857-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was semi-automatically purified from various organs of Arabidopsis plants using a QuickGene RNA cultured cell Kit and QuickGene-Mini80 (FUJIFILM corporation, Tokyo, Japan). The quality and purity of the RNA were confirmed for microarray analysis with an Ultrospec 2100 pro (GE Healthcare UK Ltd, Amersham Place, England).

protocol.name: P-GSE50857-5
protocol.text: Total RNA samples were reverse-transcribed, yielding double-strand cDNA, which was transcribed in vitro in the presence of biotin-labeled nucleotides with an IVT Labeling Kit (Affymetrix Inc., Santa Clara, CA), and purified.

protocol.name: P-GSE50857-6
protocol.text: Labeled cRNA was fragmented and hybridized to Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip arrays for 16 h at 45°C according to Affymetrix protocols.

protocol.name: P-GSE50857-7
protocol.text: Arrays were washed on an Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 and measured for fluorescence intensity with an Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.
